name: CUBEZ MUST DIE
description:
Cubez Must Die is an co-op fighting game with guns, you only have one life, Once you get hit your dead for good.

!NOTICE! YOU NEED A CONTROLLER TO PLAY CO-OP

Here are the features in this game:
You can shoot guns

Swing Katanas

Break pots

KILL your friends

and... drink beer?

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

ESC to exit to menu

R to restart

WASD to move

RMB to aim

LMB to shoot

E To Grab

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

RT to shoot

LEFT JOYSTICK to move

RIGHT JOYSTICK to aim

Y To Grab

A to jump
